(static) nurbsByData(frame, degreeU, degreeV, knotsU, knotsV, controlPoints, weights)

Creates a Nurbs surface from user-specified data
Parameters:
Name Type Description
frame
degreeU int Degree of the surface in the u-Direction
degreeV int Degree of the surface in the v-Direction
knotsU array Knots in the u-Direction
knotsV array Knots in the v-Direction
controlPoints array Array of points / vertex objects through which the curve passes ( [[x1, y1, z1], [x2, y2, z2], [x3, y3, z3], [x4, y4, z4], ...] )
weights array Weights ( optional parameter; maybe 'undefined' )

(static) nurbsCone(frame, height, radius1, radius2) → {mobiusobject}

Creates a cylinderical or conical surface at the origin of the frame given
Parameters:
Name Type Description
frame
height float Height of the cone
radius1 float Radius of the base of the cone
radius2 float Radius of the top of the cone; Setting this value to 0 would result in a cone; Setting this to be equal to radius1 would result in a cylinder
